articles.description: Hosts France cruise to top spot in Pool A at the Rugby World Cup as they beat Italy, and will face one of South Africa, Ireland or Scotland in the quarter-finals.
articles.title: France crush Italy to reach World Cup last eight

articles.description: Substitute Cloe Lacasse scores to salvage a dramatic draw for Arsenal at Manchester United in the Women's Super League.
articles.title: Lacasse late heroics earn draw for Arsenal at Man Utd

articles.description: Max Verstappen storms to pole position at the Qatar Grand Prix and needed only one run in the final qualifying session to do it.
articles.title: Verstappen on pole in Qatar as title looms

articles.description: Sam Tomkins delivers the clutch try to take Catalans Dragons back to Old Trafford and end St Helens' hold on the Super League title.
articles.title: Tomkins the hero as Catalans end Saints reign

articles.description: BBC Scotland's chief sports writer Tom English previews the task facing Scotland against Ireland in the Rugby World Cup.
articles.title: 'Scotland primed for shot at destiny against formidable Irish'

articles.description: USA's Simone Biles wins her sixth world all-around gold at the World Gymnastics Championships in Antwerp, Belgium.
articles.title: 'Incredible' Biles wins sixth world all-around gold

articles.description: Tottenham boss Ange Postecoglou says he would dispose of the video assistant referee system "in its current form".
articles.title: Postecoglou would ditch VAR system 'in current form'

articles.description: Bas de Leede's impressive all-round efforts are in vain as Pakistan beat Netherlands by 81 runs in the World Cup.
articles.title: Pakistan beat spirited Netherlands in World Cup

articles.description: Juventus midfielder Paul Pogba's failed drugs test is confirmed after his B sample also tests positive.
articles.title: Pogba's B sample confirms positive drugs test

articles.description: Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta says Bukayo Saka could be in contention to face Premier League champions Manchester City on Sunday.
articles.title: Arsenal's Saka 'in contention' to face Man City
